EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 1 - AirScale
EmailTemplate.subject: Aim high with active antennas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Aim high with active antennas Boost capacity, improve coverage, use precious spectrum more efficiently The antenna is a vital yet often overlooked part of the cell-site, especially when massive capacity expansion is required. Upgrade to active antennas.
It’s the quick, cost-effective way to deploy gigabit data rates on the path to 5G. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
